diff_hunk:
@@ -15,6 +15,14 @@
 #define PyLong_FromLong         PyLong_FromLongLong
 #define PyLong_AsLong           PyLong_AsLongLong
 #define PyLong_FromUnsignedLong PyLong_FromUnsignedLongLong
+
+#ifdef PyInt_Check
+#undef PyInt_FromLong
+#undef PyInt_AsLong
+
+#define PyInt_FromLong          PyLong_FromLong
+#define PyInt_AsLong            PyLong_AsLong
body: Actually, the `PyInt` functions are defined below, at Line 25 - 29. This one is essential for Windows, but not necessary for Unix systems.  `int64_t` is used instead of `long`. It is the same with `long long` in Windows, but `long` in Unix systems.
body_html: Actually, the PyInt functions are defined below, at Line 25 - 29. This one is essential for Windows, but not necessary for Unix systems. int64_t is used instead of long. It is the same with long long in Windows, but long in Unix systems.
